definition: (emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
that is/i.e.
in other words/that is to say/so/thus
in other words/that is
lit. to believe in the rain on hearing the wind (idiom)/to believe rumors/to be credulous
lit. either the fish dies or the net gets torn (idiom)/fig. it's a life-and-death struggle/it's either him or me
pinyin: bu4 shi4 yu2 si3 jiu4 shi4 wang3 po4

definition: it doesn't matter whether a cat is white or black; as long as it catches mice it's a good cat (variant of a Sichuanese saying used in a speech by Deng Xiaoping 鄧小平|邓小平[Deng4 Xiao3 ping2] in 1962, usually associated with his economic reforms starting in 1978, in which pragmatism was favored over ideological purity)
pinyin: bu4 guan3 bai2 mao1 hei1 mao1 , zhuo1 zhu4 lao3 shu3 jiu4 shi4 hao3 mao1
containing_words.word: 不管白猫黑猫，捉住老鼠就是好猫

definition: unity is strength (revolutionary slogan and popular song of 1943)
pinyin: tuan2 jie2 jiu4 shi4 li4 liang5

definition: all is grist that comes to the mill (idiom)
pinyin: jian3 dao4 lan2 li3 jiu4 shi4 cai4

definition: see 有奶便是娘[you3 nai3 bian4 shi4 niang2]
lit. on hearing wind, to say rain/to agree uncritically with whatever people say/to parrot other people's words/to chime in with others
pinyin: ting1 jian4 feng1 jiu4 shi4 yu3

sentences.english: McDonald's and KFC use this kind of international business strategy to make their profit.
sentences.chinese: 麦当劳和肯得及就是利用这种国际化策略来盈利的。

sentences.english: I just wanted to write down everything the professor said and memorize it.
sentences.chinese: 我就是把教授讲的话原原本本纪录下来然后记住。

sentences.english: There is no doubt he is the "Rock Star" CEO.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，他就是传说中的“摇滚明星式”CEO。

sentences.english: But he has one problem -- a hot temper.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他有一个问题，那就是脾气太急燥。

sentences.english: But it was this sense of failure that made him determined to succeed in his new life.
sentences.chinese: 但就是这种失败感使他决心在新的生活中取得成功。

sentences.english: All the old lady did was quote a scripture to you.
sentences.chinese: 这位剩女所做的就是念了一段经。

sentences.english: So you testify against yourselves that you are the descendants of those who murdered the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 这就是你们自己证明，是杀害先知者的子孙了。

sentences.english: Why should the wind do his bidding? The wind is just wind.
sentences.chinese: 为什么风要为他服务呢？，风就是风。
我就是一个自恋主义者。

sentences.english: If the teacher is a lamp, I'm reluctant to burning wick.
sentences.chinese: 如果老师是一盏灯，我就是舍不得燃烧的灯芯。

sentences.english: So, that is how we got the diffusion equation.
sentences.chinese: 这就是得到扩散方程的过程。

sentences.english: All summer, my goal HAS BEEN to catch a firefly. ---How do you translate HAS BEEN?
sentences.chinese: 整个夏天，我的目的就是捉到一只荧火虫。

sentences.english: Shall iron break the northern iron and the steel?
sentences.chinese: 人岂能将铜与铁，就是北方的铁折断呢。

sentences.english: The first thing he asked me was to help him get some dynamite, so that he could blow up Kim Jong Il.
sentences.chinese: 他对我提的第一个要求就是帮他搞到一些炸药。

sentences.english: Reading comprehension is a reading process where readers can construct the meaning of version.
sentences.chinese: 读解就是读者建构文本意义的阅读过程。

sentences.english: His job is to bend the steel to make chairs.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作就是弄弯钢材来做椅子。

definition: is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
actually/in fact/really
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
see 的士[di1 shi4]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
aim/clear
really and truly
immediately/at once

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
because/owing to/on account of
therefore/as a result/so/the reason why
no/is not/not
fault/blame
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
this/this one
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
merely/simply/only/but
nevertheless/actually/the fact is ...
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
but/however/(used for emphasis) indeed
